definitions: joined or blended to form a single entity

examples.text: skeletal malformations such as fused vertebrae

shortDefinitions: joined or blended to form single entity

definitions: (of groups of atoms or cellular structures) joined or coalesced

examples.text: organic compounds containing two or more fused benzene rings

shortDefinitions: (of groups of atoms or cellular structures) joined or coalesced

definitions: (of a material or object) joined to something else by being melted with intense heat
shortDefinitions: (of material or object) joined to something else by being melted with intense heat

definitions: (of a circuit or electrical appliance) provided with a fuse
shortDefinitions: (of circuit or electrical appliance) provided with fuse
